name: valueset-infant-s-movements
title: Infant's Movements
description: Codes representing possible values for the Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth element

concept.display: Moves on his or her own or moves spontaneously or without stimulation

designation.value: The young infant moves on his or her own or moves spontaneously or without stimulation

concept.display: Movement only when stimulated but then stops

designation.value: The young infant has movement but only when stimulated and then movement stops
The young infant has no movement at all even after stimulation
